title: Flappy Bird
description: Tap or press space to flap and avoid pipes!

instructions.desktop: Press SPACE or UP arrow to flap. Avoid the pipes!
instructions.mobile: Tap the screen to flap. Avoid the pipes!

how_to_play.title: How to Play
items: Press SPACE or tap to flap
Get as far as you can!

tips.title: Pro Tips
items: Aim for the middle of gaps
Stay calm - rushing leads to mistakes
